data.name: CompanionConfig
data.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <DictionaryProxyOfStringObject xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <KeysAndValues> <Key>LoggingLevel</Key> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">WARN</Value> </KeysAndValues> <KeysAndValues> <Key>BaseUrl</Key> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string"></Value> </KeysAndValues> <KeysAndValues> <Key>CopyEmailsWhenFiling</Key> <Value xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</Value> </KeysAndValues> <KeysAndValues> <Key>UserName</Key> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string"></Value> </KeysAndValues> <KeysAndValues> <Key>Password</Key> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string"></Value> </KeysAndValues> <KeysAndValues> <Key>LocalFilePath</Key> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string"></Value> </KeysAndValues> <KeysAndValues> <Key>ShowCollapsedOnStart</Key> <Value xsi:type="xsd:boolean">false</Value> </KeysAndValues> <KeysAndValues> <Key>AutomaticThreadLinking</Key> <Value xsi:type="xsd:boolean">false</Value> </KeysAndValues> <KeysAndValues> <Key>UseSso</Key> <Value xsi:type="xsd:boolean">false</Value> </KeysAndValues> <KeysAndValues> <Key>OpenPassportLinksInDefaultBrowser</Key> <Value xsi:type="xsd:boolean">false</Value> </KeysAndValues> <KeysAndValues> <Key>EnablePerformanceLogging</Key> <Value xsi:type="xsd:boolean">false</Value> </KeysAndValues> <KeysAndValues> <Key>LogAnonymousUsageStatistics</Key> <Value xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</Value> </KeysAndValues> <KeysAndValues> <Key>LastAutoUpdatePerformedDateTime</Key> <Value xsi:type="xsd:dateTime">2018-10-06T14:32:38.5907784-04:00</Value> </KeysAndValues> <KeysAndValues> <Key>InitialLoad</Key> <Value xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</Value> </KeysAndValues> </DictionaryProxyOfStringObject>

data.name: OpenAndExpandNInspectorWindowsWithoutClosing
data.value: Log in to Office Companion Open e-mail inspector window Expand the Office Companion Wait for the Office Companion to load plus two seconds Repeat steps 2-4, {n} times Close all inspector windows

data.name: OpenExpandAndCloseNInspectorWindows
data.value: Log in to Office Companion Open e-mail inspector window Expand the Office Companion Wait for the Office Companion to load plus two seconds Close inspector window Repeat steps 2-5, {n} times

data.name: ReloadInvoiceList
data.value: Log in to Office Companion Open matters tab Open spend tab Repeat steps 2-3, {n} times

data.name: ReloadMatterList
data.value: Log in to Office Companion Open all matters tab Open favorites list Repeat steps 2-3, {n} times

data.name: ReloadMatterSummaryTabs
data.value: Log in to Office Companion Open matter emails tab Open matter documents tab Open matter narratives tab Open matter people tab Open matter tasks/events tab Repeat steps 2-6, {n} times

data.name: ReportTemplate
data.value:
<!DOCTYPE html>

<html lang="en" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<head>
    <style type="text/css">
        body {
            font-family: "Times New Roman";
            font-size: 12px;
            padding: 0.2in 0.3in;
            color: black;
        }
        h1 {
            font-size: 17px;
        }
        h2 {
            font-size: 15px;
        }
        h3 {
            font-style: italic;
            font-size: 15px;
            font-weight: normal;
        }
        table, div, img  {
            page-break-inside: avoid;
        }
        table {
            width: 100%;
            border-collapse: collapse;
        }
        th {
            color:black;
        }
        .first-row {
            color: white;
        }
        table.info-container {
            width: 80%;
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 0.2in;
        }
        img {
            margin: 20px auto;
            text-align: center;
        }
        .bad {
            color: #B22222;
        }
        .good {
            color: #2E8B57;
        }
        .highlight {
            font-weight: bold;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

</body>
</html>

data.name: ScrollInvoiceList
data.value: Log in to Office Companion Open spend tab Scroll to bottom of the list of 500 invoices

data.name: ScrollMatterList
data.value: Log in to Office Companion Open matters tab Scroll to bottom of the list of 500 matters

data.name: UploadNEmailsAtOnce
data.value: Populate test emails folder with {n} messages Log in to Office Companion Open first matter in list Open test emails folder and select all messages Drag all selected messages to opened matter

data.name: UploadNEmailsOneAtATime
data.value: Populate test emails folder with {n} messages Log in to Office Companion Open first matter in list Open test emails folder and select first (or next) email Drag email opened matter Repeat steps 3-5, {n} times
